Structure.Name: EHF Get Evidence Request
Structure.Description: Document type used to request evidences.

Element.Name: Customization Identifier
Element.Description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

Element.Name: Profile Identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears. It enables the buyer to process the invoice in an appropriate way.

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: An identification of the specification containing the total set of rules regarding semantic content, cardinalities and business rules to which the data contained in the instance document conforms. The identification may include the version of the specification as well as any customizations applied. Use UUID (universally unique identifier), version 4

Element.Name: Issue date
Element.Description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued. Must not include timezone information. Format YYYY-MM-DD

Element.Name: Request information
Element.Description: Information on the economic operator and the evidence requested for this operator

Element.Name: Evidence Party identifier
Element.Description: Valid organizational number for the party whom the evidence is requested

Element.Name: Is party a subcontractor?
Element.Description: Boolean (true/false) value to indicate if party is a subcontractor

Element.Name: Evidences requested
Element.Description: The evidence(s) requested for a party

Element.Name: Criterion ID
Element.Description: Criterion identifier, to be referenced in the response. Use UUID from the Crtierion Taxonomy

Element.Name: Criterion Type
Element.Description: Criterion type code, from the Criterion Taxonomy
